content.p: Welcome to the Careers Advisory Service (CAS), University of Nottingham Malaysia! CAS offers various support and services to support the students throughout their career development journey and guide them in identifying their strengths and interests, exploring suitable jobs and industries, and making decisions for their future career path. From the beginning, we would advise the students to begin thinking about their career pathways starting from the first year itself. CAS uses a systematic Career Development Roadmap to help students acquire self-awareness, explore career path and get ready for the future world of work. Our team of experienced careers advisers provides a comprehensive range of support and services that are geared towards empowering students, their careers and employability in following ways: To stay updated with us, please follow us on Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram. For any appointment and inquiries, kindly reach us at careers@nottingham.edu.my. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
